section.title: Requirements
section.p: The Eclim plugins for vim require vim 7. At the time of this writing, vim 7 is still alpha, but I have yet to encounter any major issues with it. For information on obtaining and installing vim 7 please see the installation docs.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: Currently there are only a couple global configuration settings available.

ul.li:
g:EclimDebug (Default: 0)
Setting this variable to 1 will turn on some simple debugging.

g:EclimEchoHighlight (Default: "Statement")
Determines which highlight group will be used for informative messages.

g:EclimBrowser (No Default)
Configures the external web browser command to use when viewing javadocs, etc. The <url> in the command will be replaced with the target url.
Firefox
let g:EclimBrowser = 'firefox "<url>"'
Mozilla
let g:EclimBrowser = 'mozilla "<url>"'
Opera
let g:EclimBrowser = 'opera "<url>"'
IE
let g:EclimBrowser = 'iexplorer "<url>"'

section.title: Global Commands
section.p: The following is a list of commands that can be executed in any vim window, regarless of the current filetype.

ul.li:
:PingEclim
Pings eclimd to see if it is up and running.

:ShutdownEclim
Shuts down the current running eclimd instance.
